description: Expected findings for rushed-mvp test fixture
purpose: Validates Bosun detects common issues in quickly-shipped code

findings.title: Missing error handling on async operations
findings.description: Multiple async functions lack try/catch blocks. Network failures, database errors, and file system issues will crash the application.

findings.title: Unhandled promise rejections
findings.description: prefetchUsers() fires promises without awaiting or catching rejections. Errors will be silently swallowed or cause unhandled rejection warnings.

findings.title: No validation on external data
findings.description: importUsers() trusts external JSON without validation. Malformed data will cause runtime errors or data corruption.

findings.title: N+1 query pattern
findings.description: get_orders_with_customers() executes 1 + N queries. With 50k orders, this means 50,001 database queries instead of 1-2 with a JOIN.

findings.title: Nested N+1 query pattern (N*M+1)
findings.description: get_full_order_report() has N+1 inside a loop, resulting in O(N*M) queries. This is exponentially worse than a simple N+1.

findings.title: In-memory pagination
findings.description: get_all_orders_paginated() fetches entire table then slices in Python. Should use LIMIT/OFFSET in SQL.

findings.title: Unbatched updates in loop
findings.description: update_order_statuses() executes N individual UPDATE statements. Should batch into single query with IN clause.

findings.title: Duplicated validation logic
findings.description: Card number validation is copy-pasted 3 times. Expiry validation copied 3 times. Amount validation copied 4 times. Extract to shared functions.

findings.title: Magic numbers without explanation
findings.description: CalculateFees() contains unexplained numeric constants (0.029, 0.30, 0.015, etc). Should be named constants with documentation.

findings.title: Configuration values hardcoded
findings.description: Retry count (3) and timeout (30s) are hardcoded. Should be configurable or at minimum named constants.

findings.title: README lacks essential information
findings.description: README is missing: installation steps, prerequisites, configuration, API documentation, and examples. 'Ask John' is not a contribution guide.

findings.title: TODO placeholders in documentation
findings.description: API section contains only 'TODO'. Either document the API or remove the section.

findings.title: No test files present
findings.description: Project has no test files. Critical paths (payment processing, user operations, order queries) are completely untested.

findings.title: SQL injection vulnerability
findings.description: getUserFromDb() interpolates user input directly into SQL query. Use parameterized queries.

findings.title: SQL injection in multiple queries
findings.description: String interpolation used for SQL queries throughout. All db.query() calls with f-strings are vulnerable.
